advantages.title: talk, not type
advantages.text: Learn languages the natural way — by speaking. Voxly listens, responds, and helps you level up in real time.

advantages.title: real convos
advantages.text: Practice everyday situations anytime. No stress, no judgment — just real progress vibes.

advantages.title: pronunciation coach
advantages.text: Voxly fixes your pronunciation instantly so you sound more natural, confident, and straight-up fluent.

advantages.title: learn at your vibe
advantages.text: Your pace, your topics, your vibe. From chill chats to professional flow.

about.title: Meet Voxly, your AI language bestie
about.text: Voxly helps you learn languages by helping you speak them. Powered by AI, made for Gen-Z learners who want fast, real results.
